entry.title: Open Data 500 Australia
entry.summary:
About This Project

Australia is working in partnership with The GovLab at New York University to conduct the Open Data 500 Australia. This is the first study of Australian companies and NGOs that use open government data to generate new business, develop new products and services, and create social value.

How To Participate

  1. If you represent an Open Data company or NGO

    • Please fill out our survey.

  2. If you would like to recommend an Open Data company

    • Please email us at opendata@communications.gov.au.

  3. If you have general information to share about open data in Australia

    • Email us at opendata@communications.gov.au.
